component:nypr-design-system/components/.title: atoms/-button
component:nypr-design-system/components/.text: Base button. Use this component to compose more specific buttons and components. Usage: {{#atoms/-button}} Click Me {{/atoms/-button}}

attributes.name: atoms/-button
attributes.description:
Base button. Use this component to compose more specific buttons and components.

Usage:

{{#atoms/-button}}
  Click Me
{{/atoms/-button}}

accessors.name: tierClass
accessors.description: Computes the class applied based on the value of tier

arguments.name: type
arguments.description: Specify the type attribute for the button. Default is "button".

arguments.name: tier
arguments.description: Which tier in the visual heirarchy this button should be.

component:nypr-design-system/components/.title: atoms/-kicker
component:nypr-design-system/components/.text: Render a "kicker" or small piece of decorated text. Usage: {{#atoms/-kicker}} News {{/atoms/-kicker}}

attributes.name: atoms/-kicker
attributes.description:
Render a "kicker" or small piece of decorated text.

Usage:

{{#atoms/-kicker}}
  News
{{/atoms/-kicker}}

arguments.name: text
arguments.description: Filler text. Accepted as a positonal param as well.

component:nypr-design-system/components/.title: atoms/-picture
component:nypr-design-system/components/.text: Picture element. Renders <source> elements for provided s, m, l, or xl breakpoints and images. Usage: {{atoms/-picture break-xl=1000 src-xl='https://example.com/xlarge-img.jpg' break-l=800 src-l='https://example.com/large-img.jpg' alt='Descriptive alt text' }}

attributes.name: atoms/-picture
attributes.description:
Picture element. Renders <source> elements for provided s, m, l, or xl breakpoints and images.

Usage:

{{atoms/-picture
  break-xl=1000
  src-xl='https://example.com/xlarge-img.jpg'
  break-l=800
  src-l='https://example.com/large-img.jpg'
  alt='Descriptive alt text'
}}

arguments.name: src-xl
arguments.description: Image url for corresponding extra large breakpoint

arguments.name: src-l
arguments.description: Image url for corresponding large breakpoint

arguments.name: src-m
arguments.description: Image url for corresponding medium breakpoint

arguments.name: src-s
arguments.description: Image url for corresponding small breakpoint

arguments.name: lazy
arguments.description: Should this image lazy load or not?

component:nypr-design-system/components/.title: atoms/-svg
component:nypr-design-system/components/.text: A component that will safely render any svg icon found in the app/templates/components/atoms/-svg tree. If an svg template can't be found, a warning will be printed. Usage: {{atoms/-svg icon='wnyc-logo'}}

attributes.name: atoms/-svg
attributes.description:
A component that will safely render any svg icon found in the app/templates/components/atoms/-svg tree.

If an svg template can't be found, a warning will be printed.

Usage:

{{atoms/-svg icon='wnyc-logo'}}

arguments.name: icon
arguments.description: Filename of the icon to render.

arguments.name: class
arguments.description: Classname to be applied to rendered SVG markup.

component:nypr-design-system/components/.title: atoms/media-object
component:nypr-design-system/components/.text: The OOCSS Media Object popularized by Nicole Sullivan Usage: {{#atoms/media-object as |mo|}} {{#mo.media}} Media area content, like an image {{/mo.media}} {{#mo.object}} Text content or other component {{/mo.object}} {{/atoms/media-object}}

attributes.name: atoms/media-object
attributes.description:
The OOCSS Media Object popularized by Nicole Sullivan

Usage:

{{#atoms/media-object as |mo|}}
  {{#mo.media}}
    Media area content, like an image
  {{/mo.media}}

  {{#mo.object}}
    Text content or other component
  {{/mo.object}}
{{/atoms/media-object}}

arguments.name: valign
arguments.description: Specify a vertical alignment. Accepts 't', 'c', 'b' for top, center, and bottom.

component:nypr-design-system/components/.title: atoms/section-heading
component:nypr-design-system/components/.text: Section header markup Usage: {{#atoms/section-heading}} Section Header Goes Here {{/atoms/section-heading}}

attributes.name: atoms/section-heading
attributes.description:
Section header markup

Usage:

{{#atoms/section-heading}}
  Section Header Goes Here
{{/atoms/section-heading}}

component:nypr-design-system/components/.text: Headline markup for stories. Usage: {{#atoms/story-headline}} Headline goes here {{/atoms/story-headline}}

template:docs/typography.title: This is an H1 element
template:docs/typography.text: Typography Headings This is an H1 element This is an H2 element This is an H3 element This is an H4 element This is an H5 element This is an H6 element Lists Unordered List This is a list item in an unordered list An unordered list is a list in which the sequence of items is not important. Sometimes, an unordered list is a bulleted list. And this is a long list item in an unordered list that can wrap onto a new line. Lists can be nested inside of each other This is a nested list item This is another nested list item in an unordered list This is the last list item Ordered list This is a list item in an unordered list An unordered list is a list in which the sequence of items is not important. Sometimes, an unordered list is a bulleted list. And this is a long list item in an unordered list that can wrap onto a new line. Lists can be nested inside of each other This is a nested list item This is another nested list item in an unordered list This is the last list item Definition List Definition List A number of connected items or names written or printed consecutively, typically one below the other. This is a term. This is the definition of that term, which both live in a dl. Here is another term. And it gets a definition too, which is this line. Here is term that shares a definition with the term below. And it gets a definition too, which is this line. Text Elements <blockquote /> Basic blockquote element. The <p/> tag is required for decoration. Lorem ipsum <time /> Basic time element. Components atoms/story-headline Make text suitable for a story headline Headline with Lots of Text Can Sit Here on Multiple Lines atoms/section-heading Make text suitable for a section heading. Pass a block or a text parameter. Using a block: This is a Section Heading Using a positional param: atoms/-kicker Kicker used for decorating metadata. Pass a block or a test parameter. Using a block: Category Using a positional param:
